riddles.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
hints: You might hear me in caves or canyons

riddles.question: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
hints: Everyone leaves these when they move
You can see them in sand or snow

riddles.question: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?
hints: I'm a representation, not the real thing
I can fit in your pocket but show the whole world

riddles.question: What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a head but never weeps, has a bed but never sleeps?
hints: I move constantly in one direction

riddles.question: I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
Forward I am heavy, but backward I am not. What am I?
What has keys but no locks, space but no room, and you can enter but can't go inside?
hints: You're probably using one right now

riddles.question: I'm tall when I'm young, and I'm short when I'm old. What am I?
hints: I get smaller as time passes

riddles.question: What has a head and a tail but no body?
hints: You use me to buy things

riddles.question: What gets wetter the more it dries?
hints: You use me after a shower

riddles.question: I have branches, but no fruit, trunk, or leaves. What am I?
What can travel around the world while staying in a corner?
hints: I go in the top-right corner

riddles.question: I have a neck but no head, and I wear a cap. What am I?
hints: My cap screws on and off

riddles.question: What has many teeth but cannot bite?
I'm light as a feather, yet the strongest person can't hold me for five minutes. What am I?
What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?
hints: Look at the letters in each word

riddles.question: The more of this there is, the less you see. What is it?
hints: It makes it hard to see

riddles.question: What belongs to you, but other people use it more than you do?
hints: You were given this at birth
People say it to get your attention

riddles.question: I have no life, but I can die. What am I?
hints: You need to charge or replace me

riddles.question: What has one eye but cannot see?
